mapper.select: select count(*) from sales where to_char(sales_date,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD')
select nvl(sum(cost_sum),0) from sales where to_char(sales_date,'YYYYMM') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMM')

select sales_no as sales_no, cust_no as cust_no, menu as menu, cost_sum as cost_sum, sales_date as sales_date, pay as pay from sales where to_char(sales_date,'YYMMDD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYMMDD') order by sales_no DESC
